author: tahuang1991
body:
#### PR description:

1. update the LCT match condition in CSCStubmatcher to make it configurable: either loose match or tight match
2. add number of digis counter to CSCDigiMatcher for multiplicity study

#### PR validation:

The validation is done by running GEMCSCAnalyzer under https://github.com/gem-sw/GEMCode/tree/for_CMSSW_12_5_0_x
title: Update the CSCStubMatcher and CSCDigiMatcher under Validation/MuonCSCDigis
